Reentrancy in NanoLoanEngine.lend (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#597-636):
	External calls:
	- transferValue = convertRate(loan.oracle,loan.currency,oracleData,loan.amount) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#614-615)
	- require(bool)(rcn.transferFrom(msg.sender,loan.borrower,transferValue)) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#615-618)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- loans (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#631-632)

Reentrancy in NanoLoanEngine.pay (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#941-972):
	External calls:
	- transferValue = convertRate(loan.oracle,loan.currency,oracleData,toPay) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#963-964)
	- require(bool)(rcn.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,transferValue)) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#971)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- loans (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#971-972)
newTimestamp in NanoLoanEngine.internalAddInterest (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#858-859) is a local variable never initialiazed

RpSafeMath.safeAdd (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#196-202) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)((z >= x) && (z >= y)) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#199-202)

NanoLoanEngine.cosign (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#645-657) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(loan.status == Status.lent && (loan.dueTime - loan.duesIn) == block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#647-650)

NanoLoanEngine.createLoan (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#442-469) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_expirationRequest > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#455-456)
	- require(bool)(identifierToIndex[identifier] == 0) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#467-468)

NanoLoanEngine.approveLoanIdentifier (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#559-563) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(index != 0) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#563)

NanoLoanEngine.registerApprove (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#570-577) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(index != 0) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#573)

NanoLoanEngine.lend (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#597-636) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(loan.status == Status.initial) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#602-604)
	- loan.cancelableAt > 0 (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#610-611)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp <= loan.expirationRequest) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#604-605)
	- require(bool)(loan.cosigner == address(cosigner)) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#634-635)
	- require(bool)(rcn.transferFrom(msg.sender,loan.borrower,transferValue)) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#615-618)

NanoLoanEngine.destroyIdentifier (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#695-699) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(index != 0) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#698)

NanoLoanEngine.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#754-757) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(loans[index].lender == from) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#755-756)

NanoLoanEngine.calculateInterest (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#832-844) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- amount == 0 (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#836-844)

NanoLoanEngine.internalAddInterest (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#853-900) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- newInterest != loan.interest || newPunitoryInterest != loan.punitoryInterest (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#895-900)
	- timestamp > loan.dueTime (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#873-895)
	- endNonPunitory > loan.interestTimestamp (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#863-873)
	- timestamp > loan.interestTimestamp (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#854-900)

NanoLoanEngine.convertRate (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#976-988) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(decimals <= RCN_DECIMALS) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#985)
	- oracle == address(0) (/unique_chucks/3/0xba5a17f8ad40dc2c955d95c0547f3e6318bd72e7.sol#979-987)
